item.title: Change Cutting Logs To Cash Problem
item.dc:creator: @scootkid scootkid
item.description:
@scootkid wrote:

Hello, I have done this before on a fr33sc4p3 base but now i’m trying it on a devolution base and i can’t get it right…
if i have this-

case 3037: // Oak Tree woodcutting[0] = 500; woodcutting[1] = 15; if (misc.random(2) == 1) { woodcutting[2] = 37; } else { woodcutting[2] = 38; } woodcutting[4] = 995; break;

I Understand that Woodcutting[4] = Item
but how do i change the amount? i tried other stuff and couldn’t get it right plz help
Thanks so much!~

O Or This-

case 5904: // Dead Tree woodcutting[0] = 1; woodcutting[1] = 1; woodcutting[2] = 25; woodcutting[4] = 995; break;

Read full topic
